home.title: Skymines Solo Helper
home.play1: Play against Luna, the Solo Mode opponent of Skymines.
home.play2: This helper application replaces the Automa cards and the Luna player board.

players.title: Player
players.playerBonusMarkers: Each human player gets {count} bonus markers.

setupLuna.title: Setup Luna
setupLuna.forEach: For each Luna Bot, prepare a dedicated area with:
setupLuna.playerToken: The player token with the bot's color.
setupLuna.trackMarkers: Take the 4 track markers and add one to space 0 of each company track.
setupLuna.startingBonus: Take one of the spare starting research tokens at random and apply its starting bonus to the track markers. Then return that starting research token to the game box.
setupLuna.finalNotes: The bot does not need a player board, the app will manage the Automa cards and automatically count the helium and research levels. Also leave all starting action cards of the bot's player color and any spare single energy cards in the game box.

advanceCompany.most-valuable-two-each: on each of the 2 most valuable company tracks
advanceCompany.second-most-valuable: on the second most valuable company track
advanceCompany.lead-biggest-margin: on the company track on which Luna leads by the biggest margin
advanceCompany.lead-biggest-margin-two-each: on each of the 2 company tracks on which Luna leads by the biggest margin
advanceCompany.all-four-each: on each of the 4 company tracks

discardResearchPlan.discardFirstCol: Luna discards a {plan}-research plan; she also gains any CrypCoin on the supplement space:
discardResearchPlan.discardSpecial: Luna discards the latest face-up special research plan.

gainCard.matchSlot: Luna gains each of the displayed cards:
gainCard.mostValuableShare: Luna gains the card with the most valuable share (if there are more than one, the one from the space with the lowest number).

action.abortGameConfirm: Aborting the running game - are you sure?
action.endGameConfirm: End this game and return to home screen - are you sure?
